Description: 1921 Waltham White Gold Filled GF Art Deco POCKET WATCH - TBR TBR – To Be Repaired (sold as-is). Working - But, as with any mechanical watch, it may need (and we recommend) to be cleaned and/or serviced. No crystal. Ser # 24,028,907 – 1921 year of manufacture. Twist case. Outside case is 43.6 mm. See photo of monogram. See photo of maker’s and/or other marks. We make every effort to accurately describe items inclusive of photos, which show what is being sold (unless otherwise noted). We will send you a last reminder invoice 2 days after the sale. IF we don't hear from you regarding payment by 3 days after the sale, an eBay unpaid case will automatically be opened. Confirmation of purchase is requested and Payment is required within 3 days of the end of the sale (unless other arrangements are made). We accept all forms of payment. If you block emails, you should place our email address (shown on our me page) on your unblocked email list. If you have questions or feel the shipping cost is too much - email us. All shipments are insured through a commercial insurer. We will ship alternative methods if requested if they are available to us, and will gladly provide a quote. We will ship almost all items worldwide. You may email us for a quote to your destination. "Shipping" includes all shipping costs: handling costs including packing material and commercial insurance. The cost of the item is discrete from the cost of shipping. (We will combine compatible items for a lower shipping cost). We ship using the most economical method at our discretion for flat rate shipping. Orders will most usually be shipped USPS. Shipments outside of the continental US do incur additional costs (see above). International buyers and domestic buyers requesting shipping options must wait for a quote regarding shipping prior to making payment if calculated shipping is not available; IF you have any special shipping requests, please ask and we will price out the shipping cost accordingly. Delivery cannot be guaranteed for international shipments. CUSTOMS CLEARANCE, FEES AND OTHER ISSUES ARE THE RESPONSIBILITY OF THE BUYER. (International buyers may message us to inquire if the item is prohibited in their country BEFORE bidding). Distance to your location and your country's customs office will often delay delivery - a factor beyond our control! Import duties, taxes and charges are not included in the item price or shipping charges. These charges are the buyer's responsibility. Customs form will reflect the item sale price. Please check with your country's customs office to determine what these additional costs will be prior to bidding/buying. These charges are normally collected by the delivering shipping company or when you pick the item up – do not confuse them for additional shipping charges. The buyer is responsible for retrieving items from their customs/postal authorities. If you choose 1st Class International shipping there is usually no tracking! We will not mark merchandise values below price realized nor mark items as "gifts." RETURN POLICY: We guarantee our items to be as represented, and they are sold "as described" and "as photo'd" so please ask questions before you bid. We do our best to describe items accurately.
